select count(*) from qna_board where substance like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
select count(*) from qna_board where resgist_dt between #{ begin } and #{ end }

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, board_id, title, substance, read_count, report_count, regist_dt, last_upd_dt, original_filename, rename_filename FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM qna_board WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY board_id ) ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, BOARD_ID, MEMBER_ID, TITLE, SUBSTANCE, READ_COUNT, REGIST_DT, LAST_UPD_DT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAME_FILENAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM qna_board WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY BOARD_ID ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, BOARD_ID, MEMBER_ID, TITLE, SUBSTANCE, READ_COUNT, REGIST_DT, LAST_UPD_DT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAME_FILENAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM qna_board WHERE substance LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY BOARD_ID ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, BOARD_ID, MEMBER_ID, TITLE, SUBSTANCE, READ_COUNT, REGIST_DT, LAST_UPD_DT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAME_FILENAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM qna_board WHERE REGIST_DT BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY BOARD_ID ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into qna_board (BOARD_ID, MEMBER_ID, TITLE, SUBSTANCE, READ_COUNT, REPORT_COUNT, REGIST_DT, LAST_UPD_DT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAME_FILENAME) values ((select NVL(max(BOARD_ID), 0) + 1 from qna_board), #{memberID}, #{title}, #{substance}, 0, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{originalFilePath}, #{renameFilePath})
mapper.update: UPDATE qna_board SET read_count = read_count + 1 WHERE board_id = #{id}
